ff0936e3-62c1-419c-8467-3a1e25ae92b5.name: Flexibility
ff0936e3-62c1-419c-8467-3a1e25ae92b5.notes: May ignore up to -3 in penalties for close quarters

7b2641c0-ea99-49c4-98ed-0bf40e948eb2.name: Easy to Hit
7b2641c0-ea99-49c4-98ed-0bf40e948eb2.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

65ecf7a7-fef2-43af-8a05-c8be384bffd9.name: Rapid Healing
65ecf7a7-fef2-43af-8a05-c8be384bffd9.notes: Whenever you roll to recover lost HP or to see if you can get over a crippling injury, you get +5 to your effective HT

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

a0033804-ea1b-4cb1-835f-de4a4bcddd3e.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
a0033804-ea1b-4cb1-835f-de4a4bcddd3e.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

9dd412ab-c39d-472b-9559-c207292e5f84.name: Frequency: Constantly
9dd412ab-c39d-472b-9559-c207292e5f84.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

25d0a104-20f7-4f4f-8bd6-614d28bce682.name: Frequency: Hourly
25d0a104-20f7-4f4f-8bd6-614d28bce682.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

be161cb1-34c9-403f-a1c8-1701743b7116.name: Frequency: Daily
be161cb1-34c9-403f-a1c8-1701743b7116.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

4cd73b63-e2cf-4aaa-8014-8c2a5d71a881.name: Frequency: Weekly
4cd73b63-e2cf-4aaa-8014-8c2a5d71a881.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

8a8329ef-6881-4365-9f33-1c00eee2a417.name: Frequency: Monthly
8a8329ef-6881-4365-9f33-1c00eee2a417.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

2a02b52d-22fa-4174-a122-5f7e7c4e3061.name: Frequency: Seasonally
2a02b52d-22fa-4174-a122-5f7e7c4e3061.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

a347ccc3-1276-4bbf-943b-94c5420bef9e.name: Frequency: Yearly
a347ccc3-1276-4bbf-943b-94c5420bef9e.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

f43a7c4f-adb6-4395-9274-ecc1736a96c3.name: Aging
f43a7c4f-adb6-4395-9274-ecc1736a96c3.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

79c5da9e-31a1-4f82-a69f-405555bee5a6.name: Hard of Hearing
79c5da9e-31a1-4f82-a69f-405555bee5a6.notes: -4 on any skill roll where it is important that you understand someone who is talking

0585bc33-7969-4359-99b4-2aa7f783f7eb.name: Impulsiveness (Split Personality - Female)
0585bc33-7969-4359-99b4-2aa7f783f7eb.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

eb8182c6-bd44-417d-83c0-dc9a9357ce87.name: Laziness (Split Personality - Male)
eb8182c6-bd44-417d-83c0-dc9a9357ce87.notes: Your chances of getting a raise or promotion in any job are halved. If you are self-employed, halve your monthly pay.
